fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base: $20
1 House: $35
2 Houses: $50
3 Houses: $65
4 Houses: $80
Hotel: $130

fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: If you can pay the rent without going bankrupt, you will get Mario's Die. Rolling this will give you one of these numbers: [1, 3, 3, 3, 5, 6] If the property is un-owned, or you are the owner, Mario will give you his die for free.
